todoapp.name: TodoApp
todoapp.short: Task manager built with Angular, Tailwind, and PrimeNG.
todoapp.long: Task application featuring filters, local persistence (LocalStorage), PrimeNG components, and best practices. Includes views, real-time search, and responsive design.

cineverse.name: Cineverse
cineverse.short: Explore information about movies and TV shows using The Movie Database (TMDB) API.
cineverse.long: Work-in-progress app to browse movies and TV shows with TMDB: lists for Popular, Now Playing, and Upcoming. Includes local lists (LocalStorage) for Favorites, Watched, and My List for both movies and series. Built with Angular 20, Tailwind 4.1, and daisyUI 5.1.

points.tmdb_api: Integration with The Movie Database (TMDB) API
points.sections_movies: Movie sections: Popular, Upcoming, Now Playing
points.sections_series: TV sections: Popular, On Air, Upcoming
points.local_lists: Local lists: Favorites, Watched, and My List (LocalStorage)
points.responsive_a11y: Responsive design and good accessibility (a11y) practices

zoneless_calculator.name: ZonelessCalculator
zoneless_calculator.short: Calculator built with Angular 20 (zoneless) and Tailwind 4.1.
zoneless_calculator.long: Finished calculator built with Angular 20 in zoneless mode (no Zone.js) and styled with Tailwind CSS 4.1. Includes unit testing set up with Karma/Jasmine. The repository is available on GitHub.

principles.solid_desc: Principles for modular, extensible and maintainable software.
principles.dry_desc: Avoid duplicated logic by favoring reuse and abstraction.
principles.clean_code_desc: Clear, simple code: expressive names, small functions, high cohesion.
principles.ddd_desc: Domain-centric model and ubiquitous language with clear boundaries.
principles.soc_desc: Split the system into components with single, focused responsibilities.
principles.state_mgmt_desc: Clear data flows and a single source of truth.
principles.ssr_ssg_seo_desc: Efficient rendering and correct metadata for performance and indexing.
principles.i18n_desc: Multi-language support via resource bundles and locale formatting.
principles.testing_desc: Verify behavior in isolation and as a whole.
principles.authz_desc: Protect identity, permissions and access to resources.
principles.modularity_desc: Modules/libraries with stable interfaces and low coupling.
principles.observability_desc: Useful logs and minimal metrics to detect errors and bottlenecks.
